page.title: 15SCHOOL 1 THE DEPUTY HEAD
page.content: Mr B.O'Byrne,Acting Deputy Head,Birch Hill Site,Easthampstead Park School.{ {How long before you became D.H.&main {likes & dislikes in teaching}"About 15 yrs. I least enjoy discipline & most enjoy contact with pupils.{What are {your subjects?}"Many.I spent 12 yrs at University & have degrees in English & History.I studied Philosophy & Adolesc ent Psychology"{Do you find the school {on 2 sites a great problem}"The advant ages are that younger pupils set their own standards are not influenced by ol der pupils but teachers travel between lessons & have to rush away when they need to talk to pupils"{Have children {changed during your teaching years?} "Overall children are better.The bad ones are worse but greater freedom giv es the greater % of good ones scope to develop.{What changes have you seen {since coming to Brcknll?}"The develop
